name: Puro d'Oro Magnificos
additionalNotes:
Davidoff Puro d'Oro cigars offer a luxurious blend of select, all Dominican-grown tobaccos seamlessly wrapped in flawless, Dominican Yamasa(tm) wrappers that shimmer with rich flavor. Coffee and spice notes meld with these proprietary wrapper leaves for medium-bodied, full-flavored smoke that pampers the palate with a long, complex finish. Each Davidoff Puro d'Oro has an classic pigtail at the head and is presented in a vintage-design box of 25 cigars. Try this enticing new series from Davidoff cigars now
http://www.famous-smoke.com/brand/davidoff+puro+doro+cigars
